author: andrewhong5297
content: does anyone know if there's a history of Ethereum wallets somewhere? i.e. how different standards for wallet products evolved since the first few years? I'm trying to put together the order in which these features were/will be built up into wallet products. Thanks!

author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: Chapter 5 of Mastering Ethereum is about wallets, but it seems to be a decent overview rather than an account of history.

author: pipermerriam
content: This discord server is not the place to get the type of  support your posts are asking for. This discord is focused on protocol development.
